name: Athletic Tee Mockup
description:
Photorealistic

Our mockups feature sharp details, realistic lighting and high quality textures.

Easy to Edit

All the hard work is done. Add your art and change the garment color in seconds.

High Resolution

The garment always looks great, even on Retina Displays.

Organized Layers

All layers are clearly labeled and organized for efficiency and ease of use.

Options

Our mockups are extremely versatile. Every layer can be adjusted to your liking. Heather textures can be turned on or off with just one click. You can also use your own background image.

Instant Download

Once purchased, the files are automatically sent to your email. All sales are final.

Format PSD (Photoshop)
Resolution 300dpi
Dimensions 1050x1050px

Need help? Start here.
